casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

February 19, 2010

[Cite as 02/19/2010 Case Announcements #2, 2010-Ohio-583.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2009-0739. State v. Wesson.

Summit C.P. No. CR2008030710. This cause is pending before the court as a death penalty appeal from the Court of Common Pleas of Summit County. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of execution scheduled for Februaiy 25, 2010,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is granted pending final disposition of this appeal.
